>
[Guarded Advance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3583) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

</column>

---

You slowly advance on the battlefield, taking utmost caution. You either Step and [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) or Raise a Shield and Step.
name: Guarded Advance
